title: Australian [colour] diary. No. 020
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: The magazine items feature the towns and gardens of Lismore, NSW at the time of the annual floral festival. The blast furnace is tapped and steel is produced and milled at the Port Kembla steel works.
creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
